amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the amount for energy efficiency and renewable energy by $45,641,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce energy efficiency and renewable energy by $45,641,000 and increase the spending reduction account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 127 - 296 (Roll no. 547).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 127 - 296 (Roll no. 547).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Pompeo.
